question: Which state has decided to launch a special Campaign for “Focused Group COVID Testing”?
explanation:
The Government of Uttar Pradesh has decided to launch a Focused Group COVID Testing campaign. This special campaign would be in place for a period of 16 days and is aimed to break the chain of Corona infection during upcoming festive season.
Karva Chauth and Diwali are two major festivals which are expected to attract a large number of people to the market and other public places and increase the risk of Covid-19 spread in the state.
